biotools.summary: G-POT is a primer set selection tool that minimizes the number of primers needed to amplify a set of loci while ensuring that each locus is amplified by a pair of primers located within L basepairs of each other, where L is an input parameter.

bioschemas.name: G-POT
bioschemas.summary: G-POT is a primer set selection tool that minimizes the number of primers needed to amplify a set of loci while ensuring that each locus is amplified by a pair of primers located within L basepairs of each other, where L is an input parameter.
